In any case, I'll post if I find out anything about the multi-state crack. I've never seen it but just mentioned it because someone else had a reference to such a crack. Cheers!

How to get additional free states: 
1. Install App and select your free state and install it
2. Once TurboTax updates with free state close app
3. Run regedit to open registry
4. Go to RegKey: HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftware
5. Delete the entire "Intuit" key
6. Close regedit
7. go to C:Program FilesTurboTaxyour versionForms, and see if your state forms are there.

Windows 7 : Go to: C:ProgramDataIntuitTurboTaxTY12
Windows XP: Go to: C:Documents and SettingsAll UsersApplication DataIntuitTurboTaxTY12
8. Delete files - 'Entitlement_TTWin.xml' & 'Price_S2010US1040PER.xml'
9. modify file in notepad - 'Entitlement_TTWin.ini' , so that all values = 0
10. Choose a new state and install it
11. Repeat process for additional states.

How to get additional free states: 
1. Install App and select your free state and install it
2. Once TurboTax updates with free state close app
3. Run regedit to open registry
4. Go to RegKey: HKEY_CURRENT_USER / Software
5. Delete the entire "Intuit" key
6. Close regedit

Windows 7 : Go to: C: / ProgramData / Intuit / TurboTax / TY12
Windows XP: Go to: C: / Documents and Settings / All Users / Application Data / Intuit / TurboTax / TY12
8. Delete files - 'Entitlement_TTWin.xml' & 'Price_S2010US1040PER.xml'
9. modify file in notepad - 'Entitlement_TTWin.ini' , so that all values = 0
10. Choose a new state and install it
11. Repeat process for additional states.
